high_descs: Move to the left side of the large green sofa
Pick up the red seat cushion on top of the green sofa
Carry the red cushion over to the floor lamp
anns.task_desc: Turn on a lamp while holding a red cushion

high_descs: Turn right and cross the room and then turn to the left and face the red pillow on the couch.
Pick the red pillow up from the couch.
Go to the right and then the left to face the lamp.
anns.task_desc: Turn a lamp on with a pillow in hand.

high_descs: turn right, walk towards shelves, turn right, walk forward, turn left before coffee table, walk to green couch
pick up the red pillow that is on the green couch
turn right, walk forward, turn right, walk forward to the lamp, hold pillow up
anns.task_desc: examine a pillow with a lamp
